title: Three Jobless Freaks
description: Once upon a time, there were three geniuses. All were job seekers.There was something more. One amongst them was always misjudged by those who cherished him to be a genius. But he fought against all odds to achieve success. And that night, he disappeared.How a misjudged genius became successful? Why a genius gave up his career on the night of his triumph?You will discover the answer while knowing the breath-taking incidents which played havoc with the lives of “Three Jobless Freaks”.This is a story of fresh engineers and a teenage girl.
author: Bijendra Kumar
